question: Which of the following operations involves accessing each element of a data structure exactly once?

options: Shift elements to fill the gap
Replace the deleted element with a default value

question: Which of the following best describes insertion in an array?
options: Adding a new element at any position
Only adding elements at the end
Deleting and then inserting a new element

question: What is the primary purpose of traversing an array?
options: To access and process each element

question: Which of the following is NOT an operation on data structures?
What happens if you try to insert an element in an already full array?
options: The new element replaces an old one
The new element is inserted at the last position

question: In C programming, how do you access all elements of an array?
options: By directly referencing the last element

question: Which data structure operation is used when displaying all elements of an array?
What is the complexity of inserting an element at the beginning of an array?
Which of the following is TRUE about deletion in an array?
options: The deleted element's space remains empty
The remaining elements must be shifted to maintain order
Deletion is not possible in an array
